title: Report Downed Power Line
description: A member of the public calls to report a downed power line on a street. This is a critical safety scenario.

tasks.description: Advise the caller to stay at least 30 feet away from the line and to not touch anything it may be in contact with.
Get the precise location of the downed line (address, cross-streets, landmarks).
Dispatch an emergency crew immediately to make the area safe and begin repairs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a Priority 1 emergency work order.
